description: black vest with predominately orange and red printed lining fabrics; horizontal bands of multicolored horizontal cross stitch embroidered geometric patterns; decorated overall with buttons of various colors and styles; three pendants on PR shoulder: beaded triangle, three-sided medallion with two red beads and cluster of flower-shaped buttons on cord; zippers used as trim at arm openings, front opening and hem
markings: at back of neck, on cloth tag: [A22 (cross out)]
medium: Cotton, buttons, beads, zippers, metal ornament; needlework
title: Child's vest
